existing_features.title: Add a user-accessible download option that provides the current plain-text UI translations file as a direct file download in the browser (same format as `frontend/src/texts/ui-texts.txt`: `KEY = English | Spanish`).
Update the plain-text workflow documentation to include clear instructions on how to download the translations text file from the app UI and where that file maps in the repository.

projectName: Provide a downloadable UI text file for editing
